mapper.select: SELECT p.idx, p.title, p.price, CONCAT('http://192.168.1.92:8000/', COALESCE(p.thumImg, 'default_image.png')) AS thumImg, p.ani_title, p.relDT, p.brand, p.fee, p.stock, p.pro_detail, p.category, CONCAT('http://192.168.1.92:8000/', COALESCE(MIN(i.detailImg), 'default_image.png')) AS detailImg FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_productimg i ON p.idx = i.pro_idx WHERE p.idx = #{storeId} GROUP BY p.idx, p.title, p.price, p.thumImg, p.ani_title, p.relDT, p.brand, p.fee, p.stock, p.pro_detail, p.category;
SELECT CONCAT('http://192.168.1.92:8000/', detailImg) AS detailImg FROM t_productimg WHERE pro_idx = #{pro_idx}
SELECT idx, title, price, thumImg , ani_title, relDT, brand, fee, stock, pro_detail, category FROM t_product

SELECT * FROM t_product
ORDER BY created_date DESC
ORDER BY popularity DESC
ORDER BY price DESC
ORDER BY price ASC
ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT * FROM t_product WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT DISTINCT f.type FROM t_firstcategory f JOIN t_product p ON p.category = f.code where f.type is not null
SELECT s.type FROM t_secondcategory s JOIN t_firstcategory f ON s.first_code = f.code WHERE f.code = #{category}
SELECT s.type FROM t_secondcategory s JOIN t_firstcategory f ON s.first_code = f.code WHERE f.code = #{code}

SELECT s.*, COALESCE(likeData.likeCount, 0) AS popularity FROM t_product s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pro_idx, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM t_prolike GROUP BY pro_idx ) likeData ON s.idx = likeData.pro_idx WHERE s.category = #{category} ORDER BY s.regDT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_basket WHERE useridx = #{useridx} AND pro_idx = #{pro_idx} AND delState=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_basket(pro_idx, useridx, amount, total) VALUES(#{pro_idx}, #{useridx}, #{amount}, #{total})
mapper.select: SELECT b.idx, b.pro_idx, b.useridx, b.amount, b.total, p.ani_title, p.title, p.thumImg, p.price, p.fee FROM T_basket b JOIN T_product p ON b.pro_idx = p.idx WHERE b.useridx=${param1} AND b.delState=0 ORDER BY b.regDT desc
